attributes.action: STOP the proposed selling off of Dover
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The selling off of Dover is a disgrace, this is British land that belongs to the people of this Island, it does not belong to the government, this is an act of treason and should be stopped.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
